item.title: beSOLiD Airy Linen Kurta Pant Set for Women’s
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Package content:- Linen straight kurta with pant set for womens. Crafted from a blend of linen and cotton, the kurti...
item.content:encoded:
• Package content:- Linen straight kurta with pant set for womens.
  • Crafted from a blend of linen and cotton, the kurti offers a comfortable and flexible fit with a touch of sophistication. The linen cotton material not only ensures comfort but also provides a luxurious and breathable feel.
  • The open collar and rolled-up sleeves design adds a contemporary and chic element to the kurti, enhancing the neckline with a stylish flair.
  • Traditional wear, casual Wear, evening wear, office wear, daily wear. Stay fresh and confident all summer long with our women’s kurti and pant made from durable and breathable fabric.
  • Care instructions: do not bleach & tumble dry, only machine/hand wash, gentle tumble dry & low temperature ironing.
